des:
Steps to Connect Alexa to Abseco App and Enable Abseco's Smart Home Skill:

1. Download the "Abseco" app for your Android or iOS device, and then register an account.
2. Configure your devices in the Abseco app and change the appropriate name for your devices. For example: bedroom light, kitchen light, master bedroom fan, etc.
3. Download the Amazon "Alexa" app for your Android or iOS device and then configure Amazon Echo device with "Alexa" app.
4. Enable "Abseco" skill. You can enable the "Abseco" skill in two methods;

4.1. First method
(a). Open your "Abseco" app and navigate to the "Me" tab.
(b). Click on the "Alexa" icon under "Third-Party Voice Services" and copy the verification code by clicking the "Get" button next to "Link with Verification Code".
(c). Search "Abseco" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category and click the "Enable Skill" button and you'll be navigated to the "Abseco" skill linking page.
(d). Paste the 8-digit Verification Code, copied from the "Abseco" app, and click Authorize, you'll be directed to the success page.

4.2. Second method
(a). Search "Abseco" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category and click the "Enable Skill" button and you'll be navigated to the "Abseco" skill linking page.
(b). Click "More Login Methods" at the bottom of the Abseco skill linking page.
(c). Click "Link with Account Password".
(d). Enter your Abseco login credentials, and click "Link Now" to authorize, you'll be redirected to the success page.

Now the setup has been completed. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices.

Light Controls:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light"
"Alexa, dim bedroom light"
"Alexa, set the bedroom light to 20 percent"

Fan Controls:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom fan"
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom fan"
"Alexa, set the bedroom fan speed to level 3"

Switch Controls:
"Alexa, turn on the TV switch"
"Alexa, turn off the TV switch"

In case you have any questions or problems connecting, please email us at care@abseco.ltd
